PSCT.Base: If you control a "White Forest" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand or field to the GY; draw 1 card. If this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "White Forest" Synchro Monster you control or in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card, but negate its effects. You can only use each effect of "Rucia of the White Forest" once per turn.
